00023 #ifndef _CTK_SPINLOCK_HPP
00024 #define _CTK_SPINLOCK_HPP
00025 
00026 #ifndef __SPU__
00027 # include "ctk_spinlock.h"
00028 # include "ctk_mutex.h"
00029 # include "Exception.hpp"
00030 #else
00031 # if defined(UNIT_TEST) || defined(_CTKLIB)
00032 #  include "ctk_spu_mutex.h"
00033 # else
00034 #  include "spu/ctk_spu_mutex.h"
00035 # endif
00036 #endif
00037 
00042 namespace ctk {
00043 
00047 class Spinlock : public EAObject {
00048 #ifndef __SPU__
00049         ctk_spinlock_ea_t m_lock;
00050 
00051     public:
00052         Spinlock() : m_lock(0) {
00053             int ret = _ctk_mutex_create(&m_lock);
00054             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00055                 throw Error(ret);
00056             alloc();
00057         }
00058 
00060         Spinlock(const Spinlock &lock) : m_lock(lock.m_lock) {
00061             copy(&lock);
00062         }
00063 
00065         Spinlock &operator=(const Spinlock &lock) {
00066             assign(&lock);
00067             m_lock = lock.m_lock;
00068             return *this;
00069         }
00070 
00071         virtual ~Spinlock() { release(); }
00072 
00073         /* implement */
00074         virtual void destroy() {
00075             if (m_lock != 0)
00076                 _ctk_mutex_destroy(m_lock);
00077         }
00078 
00079         void init() {
00080             _ctk_spinlock_init(m_lock);
00081         }
00082 
00083         void lock() {
00084             _ctk_spin_lock(m_lock);
00085         }
00086 
00087         void unlock() {
00088             _ctk_spin_unlock(m_lock);
00089         }
00090 
00091         int trylock() {
00092             return _ctk_spin_trylock(m_lock);
00093         }
00094 #else /* __SPU__ */
00095         ea_addr_t m_lock;
00096 
00097     public:
00098         Spinlock(ea_addr_t ea) : m_lock(ea) { }
00099 
00100         void init() {
00101             _ctk_mutex_init(m_lock);
00102         }
00103 
00104         void lock() {
00105             _ctk_mutex_lock(m_lock);
00106         }
00107 
00108         void unlock() {
00109             _ctk_mutex_unlock(m_lock);
00110         }
00111 
00112         int trylock() {
00113             return _ctk_mutex_trylock(m_lock);
00114         }
00115 #endif /* __SPU__ */
00116 
00117         virtual operator void*() {
00118             return (void*)(unsigned long)m_lock;
00119         }
00120 
00121         virtual operator ea_addr_t () {
00122             return m_lock;
00123         }
00124 };
00125 
00126 }; // namespace ctk
00127 
00128 #endif /* _CTK_SPINLOCK_HPP */
